import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; class Main extends Component { state = { }; componentDidMount = async () => { }; render() { return (
THE MONSTERS ARE ALIVE

TAMA is a collection of 10000 monster collectibles that lives on the Ethereum blockchain. All monsters are randomly generated, making each monster truly unique. Each TAMA monster is minted for the same price (0.025 ETH) which makes the drop 100% fair. Every TAMA holder is granted 100% ownership of their monster, giving them right to use their monster artwork commercially or do whatever they want with it.

MINT A MONSTER
{this.props.totalSupply} / {this.props.maxMint} Monsters minted so far

You have minted {this.props.balanceOf} NFTs

You can mint 20 Monsters maximum

Connected Address: {this.props.account.substring(0, 12)}...

Price is {this.props.price/10**18} ETH + gas



OPENSEA ETHERSCAN
THE CLUB

When purchasing a TAMA Monster, you are part of the TAMA club for as long as the monster stay in your wallet. This will give you perks further down the line when we reach our roadmap goals and new features will be added.

Each and every monster is unique and generated from over 125 traits (headwear, face, eyes, body and more). No monster is the same as any other!

Each monster is stored on the Ethereum blockchain as an ERC-721 token and hosted on IPFS.

All Monsters cost 0.025ETH to mint.

You will need MetaMask setup to be able to mint a TAMA Monster Club NFT.

ROADMAP

10% We're not going anywhere, we're here to grow!

20%Airdrop 5 NFTs to random holders

40%Rarity.tools listing

70%Merch store! We're exploring collaborations with great brands for high quality merch

85%TAMA Token, what's that?

100%Did someone say Monster Pet?

Terms and Conditions

@ 2021 TAMA MONSTER CLUB

); } } export default Main;
